name: animetarr
description: Pronounced 'Animator', this service provides an interface to review and add anime to Sonarr and Radarr based on release schedule.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && ncc build -m --license LICENSE.md src/app.ts && copyfiles .env.example dist
scripts.postversion:nix: rimraf dist && docker build -t $npm_package_config_docker_ns/$npm_package_name:latest . && git push && git push --tags && docker-publish
scripts.postversion:windows: rimraf dist && docker build -t %npm_package_config_docker_ns%/%npm_package_name%:latest . && git push && git push --tags && docker-publish

author: Hunter Horsman
